dict.acceptation: 复习；回顾；（报刊的）评论；[法]复审；

sent.orig: Critical Success Factor: the Weekly Review.
sent.trans: 每周的Review,是成功的关键因素。

sent.orig: Now we will review last week's lesson. First, review the match-up zone; secondly, review filling-in.
sent.trans: 现在我们来复习上周的功课，首先复习区域盯人，然后复习补防。

sent.orig: Usually before the formal review, we leave time to team members to prejudge the review content.
sent.trans: 通常在正式评审之前，我们应该留出时间给项目组成员来预告判断评审的内容。

sent.orig: Only one type of review can apply at any review.
sent.trans: 租金审核只能使用一种方法。

sent.orig: Take part in needs assessment, detailed design review, use case review meetings, etc.
sent.trans: 参加需求评审，详细设计评审，用例评审会议等。
